Перевес баланса в сторону маньяков - сурвы сосут бибу каждую катку. Но можно и мансить, трикать, ловить тайминг и хитрожопить, когда уже после пару часов игры вы освоились и поняли че к чему.
Некоторые маны имба лютейшая, особенно та, которая блюет на вас, тем самым помечает жертву, и она уходит из инвиза.
Ради интереса стоить попробовать, но играть на серьезных щщах - это надо ждать когда отполируют))

I personally love this game a lot, its a lil spooky and can definitely give you some good jump scares. My favorite option tho is when you make custom games to play with your friends. Get on discord and get to here everyone yelling and panicking. 10 out of 10.

I don't even know where to start. the game is at a point where you either get tunneled, camped,or slugged. It's no fun, nothing is rewarding. If you're playing bad you lose, if you are good you lose anyway bc of the killer camping you. And to top it of you can also get hit over pallets or windows while you are already two meters away. Amazing game definitely award worthy.

游戏玩法本身很好 不过血点的升级和继承人对于某些玩家确实不利 
但画质还有气氛渲染  杀手的还原度非常之高 各种细节满满 能体会到前几年看电影的压迫感和真实感  其实对于我来说觉得还不够血腥  不过也算18+游戏了
这里不免提一下第五人格也是仿照这样的机制 （十分厌恶）
匹配机制有时候很迷  低高阶玩家水平断层懂得都懂
玩法偏少价格偏高   一部分人是为了情怀而买账   怎么说呢 原创角色不大多魅力值不够， 联动角色们则是做的相对优秀  钉子三角头迈克尔弗莱迪等 。
对于看过各种杀手电影的小伙伴来说，来体验一下非常值得！力推吧

Things that I do NOT like with valuable points:
-The tutorials are very poor. There is nothing said about the totems and the perks. 
-90% of the game, my friends taught me how to play. Not the game itself.
-Game is full of bugs.
-There is no introduction at all about both the survivors and the killers. Only the fact from the tutorial that The Trapper uses traps.
-The loading screens are ridiculously long.
-If you wanna learn the game, how to play with either the Killer or as a Survivor, the game forces you to either play with possible toxic teammates or killer. Or I guess be famous and have friends so you can all go together on a custom match.
-Another big problem is that most of the killers are either gonna tunnel, or camp. They get no penalty for both of those.
-After 200 hours in the game, I've just learned (from friends again) that you can buy with game currency, some perks from the store. If you do not know that info, you think that specific perks like "decisive strike", is pay to have perk. And let's not mock each other. The game is kinda pay to win. Or else you have to grind for thousands of hours to get the perks that you need.
-In comparison with other games which I'm not going to name, the prices are TOO HIGH! Especially the cosmetics! Unacceptable for me.
-There is not a "try this killer/survivor with their perks, to see if you like them so then you can pay with actual money to get them" custom/single mode.
-There is no balance about the perks.

Things that I like with valuable points:
-The concept.

[h1]THIS REVIEW IS PURELY FROM A KILLER MAIN'S PERSPECTIVE[/h1]

This has to be the only multiplayer game where I literally [b]CAN NOT[/b] have fun.

If you even dare to play a game as a killer, be ready to have the most grueling, frustrating and downright hopeless 20 minutes of your life as 4 premade survivors just bully you. 

I really don't know how this game still exists when it has one of the most toxic playerbases that i have ever had the displeasure of seeing (and i used to play league).

Let's talk about the perk system. It's downright unfair towards people who don't want to spend money on dlcs. In short, the only way for you to get perks is to get other killers/survivors and then level them up to level 40. Sounds easy enough, right? Just get other characters, right? WRONG. 

Let me elaborate:

-[b]KILLERS (and survivors) ARE BOUGHT WITH EITHER REAL MONEY OR A SHITTY INGAME CURRENCY CALLED IRIDESCENT SHARDS[/b]
-You need about 9000 shards for a survivor/killer.
-[b]THIS MEANS THAT YOU NEED TO GET TO LEVEL 35 JUST TO GET ENOUGH MONEY FOR 1 (ONE) CHARACTER.[/b]
-After level 50, you get enough shards for a character every 30 levels. That is just outrageous. I played for about 25 hours and that only got me to level 19.

The other way to get perks from other killers/survivors is from a special shop that refreshes every week with 4 perks. 4 PERKS. 2 FOR KILLERS AND 2 FOR SURVIVORS. THERE ARE ABOUT 78 PERKS THAT YOU CAN GET FROM OTHER KILLERS IN THE GAME. So if the perk that you need isn't in the store, you can either wait 7 days, or just spend some real cash to get the killer that you need.

But now let's talk about actually getting the killer that you need. How do you make their perks teachable/usable on other killers? You level them up to level 40. You use blood points to do this. YOU NEED ABOUT A MILLION BLOODPOINTS TO GET A CHARACTER TO LEVEL 40. YOU GET ONLY 30k BP PER GAME. 

All of the above means that getting your ideal perk loadout is an incredibly slow (and expensive) process which involves hours and hours of grinding. 

And god forbid that you get into a public match without your optimal build. 
I don't know what BHVR did with the matchmaking system, but this just isn't fair anymore. I frequently get into games with 4 high ranking premade survivors, which leads to me getting stomped on, gen rushed and downright bullied, for lack of a better word. 

I just can't recommend this game in its current state to new players. It's an incredibly unfriendly place. 
Behaviour needs to rework a good portion of the game's systems for it to become enjoyable.

这个差评不是针对游戏本身，游戏至少还挺好玩，我要说的是这个脑残更新机制，前几天一个2G左右的补丁包下完还要修复还要重新验证50多个G的游戏文件也就忍了，今天一个73.94M的补丁包又要修补30多G的文件？为什么我玩别的游戏没遇到这样的修补机制？我说句实话，每次卸载了重新下回来都比你这个补丁包要快。（而且上个礼拜还被E宝背刺）

Игра интересная, но у нее есть куча своих минусов и все связано с пофигизмом разработчиков, которые плевать хотели на игру, им главное что бы было у них больше денег. 
В игре полно читеров, которые могут попадаться раз через раз. а тем более после раздачи этой игры бесплатно в егс не удивляйтесь если в игре станет больше читеров.

Некоторые маньяки тупо бесполезны, и с каждым патчем разработчики их унижают все больше, стрелок например из нормального маньяка превратился просто в медлителньое существо от которого увернуться легче легкого(ну маньяки это дело вкуса).

Не знаю как у всех, но у меня с недавних пор фпс стал просидать с 60 до 25-30. То есть, ты играешь пол часа, загрузился в следующий матч, и вместо стабильного фпс ты видишь 25 кадров, из за чего ты не сможешь нормально поиграть за 1/4 маньяков, так как они требуют хорошой реакции и следовательно большого фпс. Но играть на 25 фпс за например трюкача, за мора и тд, это будет нереально.

Стоит еще сказать что подбор тимейтов, это сплошной рандом, и в игру любят попадаться, глупые и бесполезные игроки. Так что если вы настроены серьезно, то берите друзей и играйте лучше с ними.

ДОПОЛНЕНИЕ. Обажаю эту игру, особенно когда каждые пол часа у меня вылетает игра с ошибкой. классно

新手局屠夫太强，高手局人类太强。
我喜欢玩屠夫，但随着段位提升，还是经常匹配到Epic免费新手玩家！
我时常站在发电机旁边，看着他们修机，他们修机速度太慢了，我都想用我的鬼手帮他们修！
是不是我站旁边他们太紧张了？老是电机爆炸！
万一他们被电休克了，我还得给他们输液或者鬼功呼吸！
算了，我还是四处溜达为妙，眼不见心不烦！
等他们修好两个发电机后，身心疲惫，我再来给他们表演挂腊肠！
他们好像很喜欢我的表演，常常激动的尖叫！
我以为我是小丑，但没曾想我是明星！
唉，做人难，做鬼也难，做个不人不鬼难上加难！
